snippet.title: Limbo of the Lost: Intro and first ten minutes of gameplay
snippet.description: After reading the news about Limbo of the Lost and the plagiarism the game is 100% made up of, I knew I had to have it, and not long after I had my copy. Things to note: The flame tunnel effect is a retinted version of a clip from the movie Spawn, and the entirely of the backdrops in this video are from Return to Castle Wolfenstein. It starts off in the jail cells at the beginning of the game, then moves to the underground crypts at the end of the first section of RtcW. Note the gremlin dude on the ceiling, and how his loin cloth falls upward.
